data.name: Last Fantasy Hentai jigsaw
data.detailed_description:
Last Fantasy Hentai Jigsaw explores more deeply the lore of the main game.
It tells a bit of the story of the young master who will become king by marrying Yuki Natsume the current queen.
You will have the opportunity to get to know a piece of history while challenging small puzzles and undressing the main character.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10/11
  • Processor: 1.5Ghz Processor or better
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: yes
